title: I can't enter a game :(
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/beb76e3f2a427e047456f21edfa0be90.png

It's happening all morning, I can't enter a game.

ign: Ultear Kishou

replies.body:
It looks like your connection to the PvP.net service (matchmaking) was timing out. This is often the result of drop offs in your connection or an overall poor connection to the servers. Our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) can assist in configuring your network to work best for Leauge.

If you continue to have issues after taking those steps, please let me know.
